name: Bear with me (itch) (Capy Constellation)
description:
This game was made for the Trijam 152 with the theme Leave me alone in 7 hours, which is way more hours than the challenge, but its still quite impressive to make a game so fast.

*WARNING FOR HEADPHONES! LOWER YOUR VOLUME*
CONTROLS

Move: A and D or left and right arrow keys

Use the mouse to click on the answers 

Stay in the middle of the couch to mark points, but don't make the bear wait

Sound effects credits

Giovanni Venturelli as the bear
Door sounds at zapsplat.com
